classification: Woodwork; Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects
description: wood vessel with rounded bottom sits on conical base; carved with horizontal bands and wide central band with diagonal incised lines; cover may be part of a gourd, with braided and woven bands of plant fibers around bottom and top forming knob; elaborate straps attached to body of vessel, made of animal hide, with fringe in some areas, decorated with braided plant fibers and cowrie shells
medium: Wood, gourd, plant fiber, animal hide, cowrie shells
title: Container
